availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William J. Ashcroft (Irvine, Estill County, Kentucky, farmer, carpenter, and soldier)

body.p: Irvine, Estill County, Kentucky, farmer, carpenter, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Gideon Ashcroft and Nancy Ashcroft. Married Julia Ann Webb Ashcroft in Estill County on April 15, 1855. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Carpenter in Estill County in 1860. Served in the 18th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment as a private.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 106B.
